entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #39640
  • Dotnet format in .NET 8 can yield code that does not compile #39637
  • Auto-referenced packages gets added to packages.lock.json for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly #39635
  • False positives from PackageValidationBaselineVersion when changing target (enum values and nullable properties) #39629
  • .NET Core 8 taking a lot longer to build and publish #39628

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Use built-in SourceRevisionId instead of git rev-parse HEAD #39613
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2409193 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
